name: Lone: and the elemental stones
description:
Entry to the OGA summer game jam.

not much of a game. i used the time to work on a dialog system, so a little chat with a few monsters and that's about it. :)

This will form part of my game Lone:and the elemental stone, so you could consider this a small alpha for it.

As host, please do not rate, but comments and feedback will be appreciated. :)
